title: description
Wave Measurements from Buoy #130 at Morr: Pacific Northwest National Laboratory (PNNL) manages this AXYS WindSentinelTM buoy (Buoy #130) on behalf of the U.S. Department of Energy (DOE) that collect a comprehensive set of meteorological and oceanographic (metocean) data to support resource characterization for wind energy offshore. The buoy collects in-situ sea surface temperature
column5: and wave data as well as near-surface air temperature
column7: and horizontal wind speed and direction.
